sentences.english: Master Oogway will now choose  the Dragon Warrior!
sentences.chinese: 乌龟大师现在将选出神龙大侠。

sentences.english: I just wanted to see  who the Dragon Warrior was.
sentences.chinese: 我就是想看看谁是神龙大侠。

sentences.english: What is the secret of Viper?
sentences.chinese: 灵蛇大侠成功的秘诀是什么呢？

sentences.english: I sense the Dragon Warrior is among us.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉到神龙大侠就在我们中间。

sentences.english: And then the Dragon warrior joined the Furious five.
sentences.chinese: 然后神龙大侠加入了盖世五侠。

sentences.english: Chivalrous men in ancient times did good deeds and destroyed evil, all of them were heroes.
sentences.chinese: 古代的大侠扬善除恶，个个都是英雄豪杰。

sentences.english: I am very happy with the result of "Blood Brothers."
sentences.chinese: 我对天堂口的成绩独孤大侠六肖非常满意。

sentences.english: Legend tells of a legendary warrior.
sentences.chinese: 传说讲的是一位传奇大侠。

sentences.chinese: 有一位传奇中的传奇大侠，他的功夫可谓出神入化。

definition: lit. to intervene when one sees an injustice (idiom)/fig. to rush to the rescue/to play the white knight

definition: rivers and lakes/all corners of the country/remote areas to which hermits retreat/section of society operating independently of mainstream society, out of reach of the law/the milieu in which wuxia tales play out (cf. 武俠|武侠[wu3 xia2])/(in late imperial times) world of traveling merchants, itinerant doctors, fortune tellers etc/demimonde/(in modern times) triads/secret gangster societies/underworld
to root out the strong and support the weak (idiom); to rob the rich and give to the poor
